entry.title: Afghanistan's Opium Business Cranks Up as the Taliban Look the Other Way
entry.content: With drought and international sanctions crippling the economy, farmers are planting more poppies and drug markets are open for business.

entry.title: Putin Dispatches Russian Vessels to Shadow U.S. Warships During Flare-Up
entry.content: A group of U.S. and allied ships were tailed by Russian ships and aircraft in the Black Sea as tensions climbed over Moscowâ€™s military deployments.

entry.title: The Ship's Captain Died at Sea. Six Months Later, His Body Was Still in the Freezer.
entry.content: Ports and governments refuse to let cargo vessels offload the remains of dead seafarers. The last voyage of Captain Sandu.
